title: Seasons Reward Penalities
body: Heyo it's me Kawaii supports and just lioe everyone knows the end of the season is coming up soon. So tl;dr my ex got me banned about 3 weeks ago (not perma) . We had a fight and he decided to ruin my life and get me perma but lucky me riot only gave me a 2 week. I was just wondering if i will still get my plat border ;( i worked so hard for it. Plus I had over 300 honors. It's all gone. Will I still get the victorious skin and my border ? I really want to know if it's even worth going to diamond if all my hardwork goes to waste. Thank you for reading.

replies.body:
Our official Ranked Season 2016 Rewards were just announced [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon).

It states:

>Some players are ineligible for rewards because of negative in-game behavior. **This applies only to the 2016 season**. Here are the details:
* Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
* Players issued a ban of seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (from August 7 on) are ineligible for this year’s rewards.
* Players banned for boosting during the 2016 season remain ineligible for rewards.
* Players who experienced fraud-related and erroneous bans will still be eligible.
* All players will have another chance at future ranked season rewards.

Let me know if you have any questions.
It said prior than 3 months, does that mean I wont get my border nor my skin :/ . He got me banned begining september. Please help :(
Wow, what kind of scum would get his girlfriend a ban on league? That should be a sin.

Hello, Season 2016 eligibility requirements have not been revealed yet. At the moment, nothing to do but to wait for announcement and of course never ever share your account again. Keep an eye on the official websites.
